file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 11-22-01-01 - NOSE WHEEL STEERING INDICATION PLATES - COMPONENT LOCATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL NOSE WHEEL STEERING INDICATION PLATES - COMPONENT LOCATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the location of the nose wheel steering indication marking and scale plates (Figure 101). AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL NOSE WHEEL STEERING INDICATION PLATES - COMPONENT LOCATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. When the old reference markings are illegible or damaged or the plates are lost, replace the plate(s). Refer to AMM MPP 32-50-10/400.
